Railroad Worker Obi:
This area has gone to hell lately!
The security was never that great, but once there were merchants and warehouses, security gaurds and adventurers...
But that was a long time ago...
Now they're all gone! All that's left is this old, worn-out railroad station and the Bandits who rob anyone foolish enough to come here!
How would you like a job?
"Tell me more about the Bandits."
